name: Test current sequential test structure

name: Fix check-main-done forward reference
notes: The check-main-done function is defined after its first use in closures. Move check-main-done definition BEFORE start-one-main-test, or refactor to avoid forward reference. Also ensure *main-pending* atom decrement and check are working correctly.
accept: make build passes and test shows Main tests done message after main tests complete

name: Verify broadcaster tests run after main tests
notes: After fixing the forward reference, verify that broadcaster tests actually run sequentially after main tests complete. The output should show main tests, then Main tests done message, then broadcaster tests.
accept: Test output shows both main and broadcaster test sections completing

name: Verify all tests pass and final results correct
notes: Ensure all 36 tests pass (31 main + 5 broadcaster). The final output should show correct totals and exit with code 0.
accept: make build passes, test shows all 36 passed with 0 failures

notes: Run test_debug_handler.valk at least 5 times and verify all 36 tests pass each time. No TIMEOUT or FAIL should appear.
accept: 5 consecutive runs of build/valk test/test_debug_handler.valk all show 36 passed, 0 failed
